snippet: The Bundesbank on Wednesday delivered a downbeat view that contrasted with a more optimistic picture being propagated by the European Central Bank.
abstract: Bundesbank delivers downbeat view of euro zone's crisis that contrasts with a more optimistic picture by the European Central Bank; says threat to German financial stability is as great as year ago, and warns of negative side effects from record low interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The Bundesbank on Wednesday delivered a downbeat view that contrasted with a more optimistic picture being propagated by the European Central Bank.

headline.seo: Euro Crisis Still Poses Threat, Germany’s Central Bank Asserts
headline.main: Bundesbank Still Sees a Threat From the European Crisis
headline.print_headline: Bundesbank Still Sees a Threat From the European Crisis
